d2_dictionary.object_name: DQL - Product Management - Validate product aliases for uniqueness
d2_dictionary.title: Returns a list of product codes for PRFs other than the currently-selected PRF using the same product code or alias as the specified product aliases. Used to validate product aliases to ensure they uniquely-identify products in the repository, including products to which the user may not have access.
d2_dictionary.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences eTMF Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
d2_dictionary.dql: select distinct product_code as name from dm_dbo.product_info_view where (product_code in ($repeatingvalue(product_aliases)) or product_aliases in ($repeatingvalue(product_aliases))) and i_chronicle_id != '$value(i_chronicle_id)' order by 1
